statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({6.09}+{8.48}\right)}={29.14}\approx{29.14}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.48}\cdot{6.09}={51.6432}\approx{51.6}.
